channel.title: Reaper chilling with 1 soul
channel.description:
#### What happened? I had two souls as reaper, I got attacked and lost one and the message said "You have 1 souls left". I was occupied that night and couldnt reap so I didnt get any extra souls. The next day I was able to chill someone even though I only had 1 soul.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I shouldn't have been able to chill anyone with only 1 soul.
#### Steps to reproduce: I guess you should get attacked and lose one soul and then try to chill someone? Idk what caused this to be honest
#### Comments: On a related note, what are the numbers that appear above Chill and the other day ability? I thought it was the number of souls you currently have, but several times I've seen different numbers on each ability. It is kind of confusing.
